column9: Based on the outlook, temp, humidity, wind predict whether the person will be interested to play tennis or not.
Play is target, since it is dependent on all other variables
Outlook, temp, humidity, wind are independent variables
1. CART - Classification and Regression Trees - uses Gini index as  a cost function
2. ID3 - Iterative Dichotomizer 3 - uses Entropy and Information Gain as a cost function
CART - used for Both Classification and Regression
